column5: Happy 2007. I have a dilemma. I am in need of some #4 Bleeding Pearl Jointed Shad Raps. Does anyone know where some of these may be purchased? - maybe a link to store or something. I'm posting this here because I can't find them anywhere and thought maybe that color was sold in Canada. Thanks in advance. Martin Looyenga Mobridge, SD
My local tackle store kept some under lock & key in back room & only sold them to his better customers earlier this summer? They must have been limited quantity?
I think Scheels has 5 & 7's but have not seen 4's. I think it would be pretty easy to pait some up. ChadM
if you can get them in other colors then terroreyes can paint them into a great bleeding pearl for you. check the business directory for downriver tackle jerry
have only seen 5's and 7's in jointed up here you may need to go the paint route manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
